name: They Know you - The Lost ones
name_original: They Know you - The Lost ones
description:
They know you.

They will come and find you, they always do.

This is a game styled back in the 1930's, you play the game on a Flatscreen

TV. The Player, Micheal, is having fun that he got a new game,

However...he doesn't know what awaits him ahead.

WARNING: This game contains Swearing, and more.

PLEASE DON'T PLAY IF YOU ARE SENSITIVE OR OFFENDED OR POSSIBLY DON'T LIKE THESE THINGS!

Thank you and enjoy!

Story (In-game): A robot set in the middle of the snow has gone missing,

and a lot of other people, known as THE MISSING ONES.

So many people are on their quest to find and retrieve them,

will they ever find them or will they be lost forever?
